title: Zed needs to be buffed
body:
How does it make sense that {{item:3047}} , {{item:2420}} , {{item:3157}}  and armor items completely shut down {{champion:238}}  in the mid-late game?

after 20min you cant kill anyone anymore and once you have used your combo you are out of energy and now you are a squishy melee that's pretty much useless.

Buffs:
give W % scaling AD and Lethality

give R lethality
give Q lethality 

have BOTRK be used with Zed more
buff items around Zed

replies.body: Is this a joke? Better be a joke.
Shouldn't this be in memes&games?

I respectfully disagree, my favorite champ is {{champion:136}}  and I ban Zed almost every time I play Sol because Zed counters him and other squishy back liners so well. Believe me try playing A sol against a Zed, it is not pleasant, I'm not saying Zed needs nerfs, I'm saying he doesn't need buffs.
Thanks for giving me a laugh, next you'll say Graves needs a buff.
buff jax and conqueror

Zed isn't as strong as current bandwagon people are jumping on would lead you to believe, but in no way does Zed need a buff lol.
The champion may be a bit strong right now in the right hands, but on average he is still below a 50% win rate; good players can play around a Zed easily.
Not sure why permabanned players care about balance.

lethality gets outscaled because of the low value of the full items, they're cheaper to get but overall you end up with less ad, I go tiamat first item personally, tiamat proc is equivalent to an extra auto and will serve far better than lethality.

Duskblade=55 ad, some lethality(forget exact numbers) and 10% cdr

BC= 40 Ad, pretty comparable, 400 HP! 20% cdr.

against melee mid laners it just feels a lot better.

My guy, Zed is my second main and I can assure you he does not need a buff. 
I would have agreed with you before the changes he just received, but after them his main problem has been addressed and he's pretty damn strong right now.

Those item's don't shut him down,  what does shut him down is his inability to get onto the crit adcs  in this meta (Challenger korea / ionian servers and competitive play only,  he's fine in yolo queue).  But yes,  he deserves a little buff but itemization is the wrong way to do it.  If you agree that we should balance around the pro scene and the top of the ladder, make zed passive stun 1.5 seconds against champs

Yeah, NOOOO

As a zed main, I think that his kit is already in a good place after the buffs rito gave him in patch 9.4

First of all, don't instantly burn your ult if you know that your opponent has a stopwatch. Usually, I just get ahead of people with stopwatches so that i can do massive damage without my ult and then use it after their stopwatch deactivates.

Also, you haven't played Zed recently, so you shouldn't say he needs a buff without absolute proof.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OVcu-Vj-qgI

If you think zed needs a buff. Your probably the worst zed in this game. Anyone playing him always do good and yet here you are asking for a buff.
Pathetic...

You're not wrong that zed needs a buff but the buff you're suggesting are stupid op. The number 1 option would be to remove the fall of dmg on his q. another buff would be reduce the cdr on his w. Another buff is his e so it actually does dmg instead of just slowing since its not very effective. Buff making things like his w have lethality scaling is stupid op.

Had a friend who too cried for Zed buffs. Told him he shouldn't get buffed, had buffs throughiut seasons and an indirect Duskblade nerf which had comoensates bonus lethality buff.
Didn't go well. So ugh... if you are bad at Zed to the point where you cry for buffs to comoensate the lack of skill to use them I think you should use other assasins that are better lol.

I seriously have to ask if you're joking. Not only does Zhonya's barely negate any damage Zed does, but he can ult you over three times now in the timespan that the active is down (120 seconds, used to be 90 before you Zed mains complained about it) and if he goes full CDR build. Also, he's able to kill you even after you Zhonya, even WITHOUT his ult, so I don't think Zhonya's is really a "counter" anymore.

Also, are you for real? Zed, just like other assassins, **are not meant to be good mid to late game**. They are early champions for a reason.
